xml.brief: Retrieve all log entries for the specified geopath

desc.p: Retrieve the log entries for the specified geopath. Use the offset and limit parameters for pagination.
Log entries are ordered by a descending date of the entry.

opt.name: fields
opt.p: Same as in the services/ocpl/paths/gplog_entry method. Pipe-separated list of field names which you are interested with. See services/ocpl/paths/gplog_entry method for a list of available values.

opt.name: offset
opt.p: Number of entries to skip at the beginning. Use this along the limit parameter for pagination.

opt.name: limit
opt.p: Maximum number of entries to return or none if you want all the entries.

returns.p: A list of geopath log entries, ordered by date. Each geopath log entry is a dictionary of a format described in the "gplog_entry" method.
